name: 洪媽益
objective: 本課程涵蓋的主題包含語音，句法，語意，心理語言，社會語言，語言學習等簡介，作為更進一步語言（母語／外語）學習，教學，研究的基礎。
schedule:
W1 September 10,	Orientation
W1-W2 September 14/17, Introduction
W2-W4 September 21/28/October 1/5, Morphology
W5-W6 October 8/12/15/19, Syntax
W7 October 22, Mid-term exam
W7-W9 October 26/29/November 2/5, Semantics
W9-W11 November 9/12/16/19, Pragmatics
W11 November 23, Mid-term exam
W12-W13 November 26/30/December 3/7, Phonetics
W14-W16 December 10/14/17/21/24/28, Phonology
W17-W18 January 4/7, Final exam and Review
END
scorePolicy:
Exams 50% (with weightings of 50/30/20)
HW and exercises 40%
Attendance 10%
END
